response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This extraordinary item is not just a product; it's an experience tailored to elevate your lifestyle. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, we believe its true value lies well beyond its face value. Considering all these aspects, I am extending a special offer to you. For a limited time, you can acquire this masterpiece for $15,000. I trust this price reflects the product's worth while also providing you with an opportunity to own something truly remarkable. Should you decide to proceed, please let me know, and we'll arrange for immediate delivery. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 15000}
